name: Mechsprofit: Mech Tycoon Simulator
description: A mech tycoon simulator game. Mechsprofit takes place in the beginning of a mech industry revolution, where giant mechanized robots are as ubiquitous as cars nowadays. You, as a novice mech factory owner have to produce (profitable) commercial mechs in order to keep your factory running.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 950 1GB Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 5th Generation Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 4 GB or equivalent Storage: 3 GB available space
